subject: Swimming
Alcoholic Beverages
Police
lead_paragraph: Nineteen members of the Lehigh University swim team were charged with underage drinking after the police broke up a party. The police heard loud music coming from a house late Wednesday night and found kegs, bottles of liquor and a beer pong table when they went inside, authorities said. One student was rushed to the hospital after a breath test showed that her blood-alcohol content was 0.31 percent, or nearly four times the legal limit for driving.
